channel.title: Need help making a server
channel.description: Alright so I have a host from godaddy and a good domain.. I have 2+ year designing experience and 1 year experience with vBulletin and IPB so that's not a problem.. I just want someone to help me handle the programming with the client and everything. If you're up for the job please add me on msn - rigged@rupturedcolors.com This will give me a chance to study java more. :D

item.description:

Hi! No, sorry, I am not here to help you code, but I can help a little bit I believe

Click this blue text to go to a very special place where you can learn!

Click this blue text to go to the ultimate search engine; your best friend, Google
Click this blue text to go to the most known Java Downloads page
